array.string: Welcome into NonoGalaxy!\nHere i will teach you the rule of the game.\nDon't panic, this is 5 minutes long!
The goal is to discover the pattern hidden beyond the puzzle. For this, you must solve the right numbers of boxes to fill on each line.
Each clues on the border side of the grid marks the number of adjacent cells to fill ...
for example: \n"5" means there is some 5 adjacent cells to fill."2" and "1" means there are two adjacents cells, no more...
this is true for horizontal lines as for vetical lines...
of course, thoses clues point to the right number of cellls to fill, but not precisely where they are on the grid line!...
For that, you need to cross the clues and you will be able to solve the puzzle.
Let's start by the most obvious: This line has a '5' clue. As the line is made of 5 cells, we know that all the line can be filled.
Look, all the solved clues became clearer! Solving the "5" line solved also the 3 others line with a "1" clue.
Now it's your time to try. The last horizontal line indicates a "3" clue...
The two cells at the extremity cannot be filled. Filling the three cells on the middle is the only solution...
To fill a cell, press it and lift up your finger for activating it. Don't be afraid, try it !
Bravo! you have solved the line puzzle. Look, the clue for the line has been cleared up. We are good !
There are some methods in order to fill the cells faster, but before, there is something important I need to talk to you...
there is the "FILL" button, to fill the cells. This is what you did...
but there is also the "CROSS" button, in order to tick the cells when you know there are blank...
You can always undo a ticked cell.
Now try to tick this cell.
Look, ticking this cell, the clue became clearer. This is because the cell has been "isolated"...
This king of information is precious while playing. Don't hesitate to use it!
The puzzle is close to be solved. There is only one cell to fill. Thine honor!
Bravo, you know the rule basis. In the next section i will explain you some usefull tips.
Sometimes you will find that some puzzle have not obvious solutions...
There is a tips I like to use and who works everytime.
Using the technic 'Simple boxes', you can find new cells to fill.
When you enumerate all the possibility, there are some cells who are always filled, no matter what.
Look here, there are 4 cells for 5 who are fillable. We can deduce then that the 3 milddle cells are necessarily fillable.
That is always working, as the length of the filled cells is greater than the half of the table. As this series of three.
Once you have clarified certain aspects of the puzzle, the rest becomes alot easier.
Now you know the technique "Single Box"! Use it as soon as you're stuck in a puzzle.
And now, you can face the NonoGalaxy world without fear !
Know that there are lots of different tips in order to progress in a challenging puzzle.
Be smart, and find your own tips ! good luck
Now it's time to show you some techniques very useful.
When you met a series of cells, to go faster, you can do them all at once ...
To do this, drag your finger along the cells that you want to transform, and raise the finger to activate the selection.
Try this here. Slide your finger along the line. And fill all the cells at once.
Congratulations! Know that once you put your finger on the board, nothing is definite ...
you can always undo what you have selected by placing a second finger on the touch screen.
Understood? A finger to turn the cell, two fingers cancel the selection.
As long as your finger is not raised up, you can always change if you think you made a mistake.
Now it's your turn to try a cancelation. Touch any cell, and then cancel it with a second finger.
Now you know almost everything you need to play NonoGalaxy.
Good luck!
Now you're old enough to manage this puzzle alone.
I'll let you apply everything I taught you so far.
And do not forget, try to be the more methodical possible, each puzzle has its own solution!
Good luck!
